document_data.caption: Khamsin
document_data.name: Khamsin
document_data.mainbody: '''Khamsin''' was a skilled [[sorcerer (kit)|sorcerer]] who traveled the deserts of [[Zakhara]] around [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1993|145|[[Khamsin]]}}
document_data.Activities: As the son of a powerful caliph, Khamsin had a life of leisure and pleasure at his fingertips. Instead, he decided to brave the burning sands of the Land of Fate with [[desert rider]]s who appreciated his useful spells of [[wind (province)|wind]] and [[sand (province)|sand]].
